My wife is part of senior management at Probi AB, Sweden. The exclusive commercial interest of Probi AB is potentially beneficial bacteria. During my membership with NDA Panel and Working Group on Claims, I will not take part in any activity/discussion related to potential beneficial bacteria.

Since March 2008 I have been engaged in a programme for self regulation of health claims on foods in Sweden as "Livsmadelsbranchens granskningsman" (LGM) A trade initiative (non-govermental initiative) originally introduced 1990, called “The food sector’s code of practice for health claims in the labelling and marketing of food products” (www.snf.ideon.se). This is administrated by the Swedish Nutrition Foundation (SNF) and jointly financed by the Swedish Food Federation and Swedish Food Retailers Federation. My function is to audit and identify when commercial actors on the Swedish food market is not complying with relevant legislation for nutrition and health claims in marketing of foods and give recommendations to apply with this regulation.
